subject: perf: fix chat scrolling lag and improve responsiveness
body:
- MessageBubble: Use refs instead of state for isSwiping to prevent
  event listener re-registration on every swipe state change
- MessageBubble: Wrap components with React.memo to prevent unnecessary
  re-renders when parent state changes
- useMessages: Increase polling interval from 5s to 30s (realtime is
  primary, polling is just a fallback)
- useMessages: Simplify polling logic and remove excessive console.log
  statements that add overhead
- chat/[id]: Simplify onContentSizeChange handler by removing double
  requestAnimationFrame and direct DOM manipulation for scroll behavior
title: fix chat scrolling lag and improve responsiveness
